titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land to Lander County, Nevada, for continued use as a cemetery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 7/24/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, acting through the Chief of the Forest Service, to convey Kingston Cemetery in Kingston, Nevada, to Lander County, Nevada, for continued use as cemetery. Grants the County an easement granting access for persons desiring to visit the Cemetery over a specified Forest Development Road.
